name: Amazon Appstore
tagline: Amazon's app marketplace for Android and Fire devices
description: Amazon Appstore is Amazon's digital application distribution platform for Android-compatible devices and Amazon Fire tablets, Fire TV, and Echo devices. It offers access to Amazon's ecosystem and unique monetization features.

commissionTiers.conditions: For most apps and games
Certain premium content

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Amazon offers a competitive 20% commission rate for most apps, compared to 30% on other major platforms.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must meet Amazon's content policy and technical requirements. Fire device optimization is recommended but not required.
submission.appealsProcess: Submit appeals through Amazon Developer Portal

seo.metaTitle: Amazon Appstore - App Distribution for Android & Fire Devices
seo.metaDescription: Publish your apps on Amazon Appstore with 20% commission. Reach Fire tablet, Fire TV, and Android users worldwide.

cons: Smaller user base than Google Play
Fire OS optimization may require extra work
content:
## Overview

Amazon Appstore is Amazon's proprietary app store for Android devices and Amazon's Fire product line. It offers developers access to millions of customers across Amazon's device ecosystem.

## Unique Features

### Amazon Coins
A virtual currency that customers can use to purchase apps and in-app items at a discount, while developers still receive full revenue.

### Merch by Amazon Integration
Developers can integrate merchandise sales directly within their apps.

### Fire Device Optimization
Apps can be optimized for Fire tablets, Fire TV, and Echo Show devices for enhanced user experiences.

name: Apple App Store
tagline: The official app marketplace for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS
description: The Apple App Store is Apple's official digital distribution platform for applications on iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS. Known for its strict quality standards and curated approach, it serves over a billion active devices worldwide.

commissionTiers.conditions: Developers earning less than $1M annually
For earnings above $1M per year

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: The App Store Small Business Program offers 15% commission for developers earning less than $1M per year. Auto-renewable subscriptions also qualify for 15% after the first year.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must meet Apple's quality standards including design guidelines, privacy requirements, and content policies. Human review ensures compliance.
submission.appealsProcess: Developers can appeal through App Store Connect or request a phone call with the App Review team

seo.metaTitle: Apple App Store - iOS & macOS App Distribution
seo.metaDescription: Publish your iOS and macOS apps on the Apple App Store. Learn about developer fees, App Store review process, and distribution options.

pros: Premium user base with higher spending power
Strict quality control ensures high-quality apps
cons: Strict guidelines can limit app functionality
content:
## Overview

The Apple App Store, launched on July 10, 2008, revolutionized mobile app distribution. It remains the exclusive way to distribute apps to iOS, iPadOS, macOS (for Mac App Store apps), watchOS, and tvOS devices for most users.

## Key Features for Developers

### App Store Connect
Apple's developer portal provides:
- App analytics and sales reports
- TestFlight for beta testing
- App Store optimization tools
- Financial reports and tax documentation
- Team management and role assignments

### TestFlight
Apple's official beta testing platform allows:
- Up to 10,000 external testers
- Up to 100 internal testers
- 90-day testing period per build
- Automatic build distribution

### App Clips
Light-weight app experiences (under 15MB) that can be accessed without full app installation.

name: Aptoide
description: Aptoide is an alternative Android app store that operates as an open marketplace. It allows developers to create their own stores and distribute apps outside of Google Play.

commissionTiers.conditions: For in-app purchases and app sales

submission.guidelinesSummary: Aptoide has flexible submission guidelines. Apps are scanned for malware but content restrictions are more relaxed than Google Play.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Aptoide support

seo.metaTitle: Aptoide - Alternative Android App Store
seo.metaDescription: Distribute your Android apps on Aptoide. Free registration, 25% commission, and reach 300M+ users worldwide.

cons: Lower trust perception than official stores
content:
## Overview

Aptoide is one of the oldest and largest alternative Android app stores. Its unique distributed model allows developers and companies to create their own app stores within the Aptoide ecosystem.

## Unique Features

### Custom Stores
Developers can create branded stores with their own apps, allowing direct distribution to users.

### AppCoins Protocol
Aptoide developed AppCoins, a blockchain-based payment protocol for app transactions.

name: Atlassian Marketplace
tagline: Apps for Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and more
description: Atlassian Marketplace is the official app store for Atlassian products including Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Trello. With over 6,000 apps and millions of users, it's essential for reaching teams using Atlassian tools.

commissionTiers.conditions: 0% revenue share until reaching $1M lifetime Forge revenue
After $1M lifetime revenue (increasing to 17% by Oct 2026)
Current rate (increasing to 25% by Oct 2026)

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Forge apps get 0% revenue share until $1M lifetime revenue. Starting April 2026, Connect apps will increase to 20% then 25%, while Forge remains lower. New Forge apps get 95% of revenue in first year.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must pass security review and meet Atlassian's technical and UX guidelines. Forge apps are encouraged for cloud products.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Atlassian Marketplace team

seo.metaTitle: Atlassian Marketplace - Apps for Jira, Confluence & More
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Atlassian apps with 0% commission on first $1M for Forge apps. Reach millions of Jira and Confluence users.

pros: 0% commission on first $1M lifetime for Forge apps
Multiple deployment options (Cloud, Server, Data Center)
cons: Revenue share increasing for Connect apps (to 25% by Oct 2026)
Forge migration required for best rates
content:
## Overview

Atlassian Marketplace launched in 2012 and has grown to over 6,000 apps serving millions of users of Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Trello.

## Platform Options

### Forge (Recommended)
- Serverless app platform
- 0% revenue share until $1M lifetime
- Required for best commission rates

### Connect
- Traditional cloud app framework
- Currently 15%, increasing to 25% by October 2026
- More flexibility but higher fees

## Revenue Share Changes (2026)

| Date | Forge Apps | Connect Apps |
|------|------------|--------------|
| Current | 15% | 15% |
| April 2026 | 16% | 20% |
| October 2026 | 17% | 25% |

**Note:** Forge apps get 0% until reaching $1M lifetime revenue across all Forge apps.

name: Autodesk App Store
tagline: App marketplace for 3D Studio Max, AutoCAD, Revit, BIM360, Inventor, Fusion 360, Maya, Robot Structural Analysis, Autodesk Advanced Steel, AutoCAD Architecture, Autodesk Civil 3D, AutoCAD MEP, AutoCAD Mechanical, AutoCAD Eletrical, AutoCAD Plant 3D, Alias, Navisworks, Vault, Simulation
description: Autodesk App Store is a marketplace for 3D Studio Max, AutoCAD, Revit, BIM360, Inventor, Fusion 360, Maya, Robot Structural Analysis, Autodesk Advanced Steel, AutoCAD Architecture, Autodesk Civil 3D, AutoCAD MEP, AutoCAD Mechanical, AutoCAD Eletrical, AutoCAD Plant 3D, Alias, Navisworks, Vault, Simulation.
content:
## Overview

Autodesk App Store is Autodesk App Store is a marketplace for 3D Studio Max, AutoCAD, Revit, BIM360, Inventor, Fusion 360, Maya, Robot Structural Analysis, Autodesk Advanced Steel, AutoCAD Architecture, Autodesk Civil 3D, AutoCAD MEP, AutoCAD Mechanical, AutoCAD Eletrical, AutoCAD Plant 3D, Alias, Navisworks, Vault, Simulation.

### Primary Products

3D Studio Max, AutoCAD, Revit, BIM360, Inventor, Fusion 360, Maya, Robot Structural Analysis, Autodesk Advanced Steel, AutoCAD Architecture, Autodesk Civil 3D, AutoCAD MEP, AutoCAD Mechanical, AutoCAD Eletrical, AutoCAD Plant 3D, Alias, Navisworks, Vault, Simulation

name: AWS Marketplace
description: AWS Marketplace is Amazon's digital catalog for software, data, and services that run on AWS. With thousands of ISV products and simplified procurement, it's essential for reaching enterprise cloud customers.

commissionTiers.conditions: Public SaaS offers and AWS Data Exchange products
AMI, container, and ML image offers
Private offers $1M-$10M (scales down to 1.5% for larger deals)

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: SaaS sellers keep 97-98.5% of revenue. Private offers have tiered rates: 3% for <$1M, 2% for $1-10M, 1.5% for renewals. South Korea adds +1% regional fee. No fees for listing - only on transactions.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Products must meet AWS technical requirements and security standards. SaaS products require integration with AWS Marketplace Metering Service.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact AWS Marketplace Seller Operations

seo.metaTitle: AWS Marketplace - Cloud Software Marketplace
seo.metaDescription: Sell your cloud software on AWS Marketplace with only 3% commission for SaaS. Reach millions of AWS enterprise customers.

pros: Private offer support for enterprise deals
content:
## Overview

AWS Marketplace launched in 2012 and has grown to host over 14,000 software products from thousands of ISVs. It's the leading cloud marketplace for enterprise software procurement.

## Fee Structure (Updated January 2024)

| Product Type | Listing Fee |
|--------------|-------------|
| SaaS / Data Exchange | 3% |
| Server-based (AMI, containers) | 20% |
| Private offers <$1M | 3% |
| Private offers $1M-$10M | 2% |
| Private offers >$10M | 1.5% |
| Renewals | 1.5% |

**Note:** Fees only apply on transactions. No upfront listing fees.

## Key Features

### Private Offers
- Custom pricing for enterprise deals
- Negotiable terms and conditions
- Lower fees for larger deals

### AWS Consumption Integration
- Customers can apply existing AWS commitments
- Simplified procurement through AWS billing

name: Azure Marketplace
description: Azure Marketplace is Microsoft's digital storefront for cloud software, services, and solutions that integrate with Azure. With a flat 3% transaction fee, ISVs retain 97% of revenue while reaching Microsoft's vast enterprise customer base.

commissionTiers.conditions: Flat 3% on all transactable offers (SaaS, VMs, containers)

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Microsoft charges a flat 3% transaction fee on all Azure Marketplace sales. This is significantly lower than most marketplaces. ISVs keep approximately 97% of revenue. Additional rebates available through the Marketplace Transact and Grow program.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Products must meet Microsoft's technical requirements and certification standards. Publishing through Partner Center.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Microsoft Partner Center support

seo.metaTitle: Azure Marketplace - Microsoft Cloud Software Marketplace
seo.metaDescription: Sell your cloud software on Azure Marketplace with only 3% transaction fee. Reach Microsoft's enterprise customers.

pros: Only 3% transaction fee (lowest major cloud marketplace)
Rebates through Transact and Grow program
cons: Enterprise focus may not suit all products
content:
## Overview

Azure Marketplace is part of Microsoft's commercial marketplace, alongside AppSource for business applications. It offers ISVs access to Microsoft's enterprise customers with one of the lowest transaction fees in the industry.

## Fee Structure

- **Flat 3% transaction fee** on all sales
- No upfront listing fees
- ISVs keep approximately 97% of revenue
- Microsoft handles tax collection and remittance

## ISV Incentive Programs (FY25)

### Marketplace Transact and Grow
- Revenue tracked by Publisher ID across all listings
- $20,000 rebate at $100K eligible Azure Consumed Revenue (ACR)
- $50,000 additional rebate at $4M eligible ACR

## Integration Benefits

- Customers can use existing Azure commitments
- Simplified procurement through Azure billing
- Enterprise Agreement support
- Co-sell opportunities with Microsoft sellers

tagline: Extensions and themes for Google Chrome
description: The Chrome Web Store is Google's platform for distributing extensions, themes, and apps for the Chrome browser. It reaches billions of Chrome users worldwide.

commissionTiers.description: Payments via Chrome Web Store Payments
commissionTiers.conditions: If using the built-in payment system

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Chrome Web Store charges only 5% on payments processed through their system, one of the lowest rates among major platforms.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Extensions must have a single, clear purpose. Manifest V3 is now required. Strong focus on user privacy and security.
submission.appealsProcess: Submit appeals through Chrome Web Store Developer Dashboard

seo.metaTitle: Chrome Web Store - Browser Extension Distribution
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Chrome extensions on Chrome Web Store. Reach 3B+ Chrome users with only $5 registration and 5% commission.

content:
## Overview

Chrome Web Store distributes extensions, themes, and progressive web apps for Google Chrome. With Chrome's dominant browser market share, it's essential for reaching web extension users.

## Manifest V3

Google now requires Manifest V3 for all new extensions, which:
- Limits background script capabilities
- Restricts certain APIs
- Enhances user privacy
- Changes how content blocking works

name: Epic Games Store
tagline: Digital storefront for PC and Mac games
description: Epic Games Store is a digital video game storefront for Windows and macOS, operated by Epic Games. Known for its developer-friendly 12% revenue share and weekly free games program.

commissionTiers.conditions: Developers keep 100% of first $1M net revenue per product annually (effective June 2025)
12% commission after $1M threshold, resets annually

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: As of June 2025, developers keep 100% of the first $1M per product per year. After that, Epic takes only 12%. Epic First Run program offers 100% revenue for 6 months of exclusivity. Games using Unreal Engine have no additional royalty on EGS sales.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Games must meet Epic's content guidelines and technical requirements. Focus on quality over quantity with a curated store approach.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Epic Games Developer Relations

seo.metaTitle: Epic Games Store - PC Game Distribution
seo.metaDescription: Publish your games on Epic Games Store with only 12% commission. Reach 270M+ users with developer-friendly terms.

pros: 100% revenue on first $1M per product per year
Free for Unreal Engine games (no additional royalty)
content:
## Overview

Epic Games Store launched in December 2018 as a competitor to Steam, offering developers a significantly better revenue split. The store has grown through aggressive expansion including exclusive titles and weekly free games.

## Epic Games Publishing

Beyond the store, Epic offers:
- Publishing support for select titles
- Marketing and promotional assistance
- Development funding opportunities
- Epic MegaGrants for innovative projects

name: F-Droid
tagline: Free and open source Android app repository
description: F-Droid is a community-maintained software repository for Android, containing only free and open-source software (FOSS). It serves as an alternative to proprietary app stores for privacy-conscious users.

commissionTiers.conditions: F-Droid takes no commission on any transactions

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: F-Droid is completely free and takes no commission. Donations are accepted to support the project.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must be fully open source with buildable source code. No proprietary dependencies, tracking, or non-free network services required.
submission.appealsProcess: Discuss on F-Droid forum or GitLab issues

seo.metaTitle: F-Droid - Free and Open Source Android Apps
seo.metaDescription: Distribute your open source Android apps on F-Droid. Zero fees, zero commission, complete transparency.

cons: Small user base compared to major stores
content:
## Overview

F-Droid is a non-profit volunteer project that provides a repository of only free and open-source Android apps. Apps are built from source code and verified for transparency.

## Requirements

### Open Source Requirements
- Complete source code must be available
- Must use only FOSS dependencies
- No proprietary Google services
- No tracking or analytics

### Anti-Features
F-Droid labels apps with "anti-features" to inform users about:
- Ads
- Tracking
- Non-free network services
- Non-free dependencies
- Promoting non-free add-ons

name: Figma Community
tagline: Plugins, widgets, and resources for Figma
description: Figma Community is the official marketplace for plugins, widgets, UI kits, and design resources that extend Figma's collaborative design platform. Developers can sell plugins with a 15% platform fee.

commissionTiers.conditions: Flat 15% fee on all sales to cover payment processing and support

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Figma takes a flat 15% fee on all Community sales. This covers credit card processing, payouts, purchase support, and refund management. Sales tax is collected by Figma and doesn't affect developer earnings.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Plugins must follow Figma's Community guidelines, be functional, and provide clear value. New paid creator applications are currently paused.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Figma Support

seo.metaTitle: Figma Community - Plugins and Design Resources
seo.metaDescription: Publish and sell your Figma plugins with a 15% commission. Reach millions of designers using Figma worldwide.

pros: Figma handles payment processing and tax
cons: New paid creator applications currently paused
content:
## Overview

Figma Community launched in 2019 and has grown to host thousands of plugins, widgets, and design resources. It's the primary distribution channel for extending Figma's design platform.

## Monetization

### Pricing Options
- One-time payments (minimum $2)
- Monthly subscriptions (minimum $2/month)
- Prices must be whole numbers in USD

### Commission Structure
- Figma takes a flat 15% fee
- Covers payment processing and support
- Sales tax collected by Figma (doesn't affect earnings)

### Payouts
- Cash out available 30 business days after sale
- Maximum one cash out per week
- Stripe used for payment processing

## Important Note

Figma is not currently approving new creators for selling paid files. Developers can still monetize through third-party payment pages linked from their plugin UI and Community page.

name: GitHub Marketplace
description: GitHub Marketplace is the official marketplace for GitHub Apps and Actions that extend GitHub's development platform. With 0% commission since 2019, developers keep 100% of their revenue.

commissionTiers.conditions: GitHub takes 0% of app sales since 2019

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: GitHub eliminated their 25% commission in 2019. Developers now keep 100% of all revenue from Marketplace sales. Payment processing fees may apply through Stripe.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must be listed by verified publishers to offer paid plans. Must meet security, functionality, and branding requirements.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact GitHub Support

seo.metaTitle: GitHub Marketplace - Apps and Actions for Developers
seo.metaDescription: Publish your GitHub apps with 0% commission. Reach 100M+ developers with GitHub Apps and Actions.

cons: Requires verified publisher for paid apps
content:
## Overview

GitHub Marketplace launched in 2017 and eliminated its 25% commission in 2019, making it one of the most developer-friendly marketplaces. It hosts GitHub Apps, Actions, and integrations for the world's largest developer community.

## App Types

### GitHub Apps
- Full OAuth and webhook integrations
- Access to GitHub APIs
- Per-repository or organization-wide installation

### GitHub Actions
- CI/CD workflow automation
- Reusable workflow components
- Marketplace distribution

## Pricing Models

- **Free**: No charge to users
- **Flat rate**: Fixed monthly/yearly fee
- **Per-unit**: Price per user or organization seat
- **Free trial**: Optional 14-day trial period

## Publisher Requirements

Paid plans require verified publisher status:
- Verified email and identity
- Valid payment information
- Compliance with GitHub's policies

name: Google Play Store
tagline: The official app store for Android devices
description: Google Play is Google's official pre-installed app store on Android-certified devices. It's the largest app marketplace for Android, offering millions of apps, games, movies, books, and more to billions of users worldwide.

commissionTiers.conditions: Applies to all developers earning up to $1M annually
For earnings above $1M per year

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: 15% on first $1M earnings per year for all developers. 10% for subscriptions after the first year. 4% discount when using alternative billing systems (e.g., 11% instead of 15%). Additional reduced rates available through the Play Media Experience program.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must comply with Google Play Developer Program Policies, including content policies, privacy requirements, and technical standards.
submission.appealsProcess: Developers can appeal through the Google Play Console within 7 days of rejection

seo.metaTitle: Google Play Store - Android App Distribution
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Android apps on Google Play Store. Learn about fees, commission rates, submission process, and developer tools.

pros: Largest Android user base with billions of active users
Support for instant apps and app bundles
cons: High competition with millions of apps
Strict policy enforcement can lead to sudden app removal
content:
## Overview

Google Play Store is the primary distribution platform for Android applications, pre-installed on all Google-certified Android devices. Launched in 2008 as Android Market and rebranded in 2012, it has grown to become the world's largest app marketplace.

## Key Features for Developers

### Android App Bundles
Google Play supports Android App Bundles (AAB), allowing developers to reduce app size by up to 50% through optimized delivery.

### Play Console
The Google Play Console provides comprehensive tools for app management, including:
- Release management with staged rollouts
- Pre-launch reports with automated testing
- User acquisition reports and statistics
- Revenue and financial reports
- Crash reporting and ANR analysis

### Testing Options
- Internal testing (up to 100 testers)
- Closed testing (unlimited testers via email or Google Groups)
- Open testing (anyone can join)
- Pre-registration for upcoming apps

name: Huawei AppGallery
description: Huawei AppGallery is one of the top three app distribution platforms globally, serving Huawei and Honor device users. It's particularly strong in China and emerging markets with over 580 million monthly active users.

commissionTiers.conditions: Standard 70/30 revenue share for most apps and games
80/20 revenue share for education-focused apps

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Huawei follows the standard 70/30 revenue share model, with better rates for education apps (80/20). Promotional programs may offer enhanced revenue share for new developers.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must comply with Huawei's policies and ideally integrate HMS Core for enhanced functionality. HarmonyOS apps get priority promotion.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Huawei Developer Support

seo.metaTitle: Huawei AppGallery - App Distribution for Huawei Devices
seo.metaDescription: Publish your apps on Huawei AppGallery. Reach 580M+ users with free registration and 15% commission for non-game apps.

pros: Large user base especially in Asia (580M+ MAU)
Better rates for education apps (20% commission)
cons: Requires HMS integration for best experience
GMS alternatives may require extra development
content:
## Overview

Huawei AppGallery has grown to become the third-largest app store globally after Google Play and Apple App Store. It's essential for reaching Huawei and Honor device users, especially in markets where Google services are limited.

## HMS Core Integration

Huawei Mobile Services (HMS) Core provides:
- Push notifications
- Analytics
- In-app purchases
- Ads monetization
- Location services
- ML capabilities

These serve as alternatives to Google Mobile Services (GMS).

name: HubSpot App Marketplace
tagline: Integrate and extend HubSpot's CRM platform
description: HubSpot App Marketplace is the official marketplace for apps that integrate with HubSpot's CRM, marketing, sales, and service platform. Unlike most marketplaces, HubSpot takes 0% commission from app developers.

commissionTiers.conditions: HubSpot takes 0% revenue share from app developers

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: HubSpot does not charge developers any listing fees, certification fees, or commission on app sales. Developers keep 100% of their revenue.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must meet certification requirements including UX standards, security practices, and functionality guidelines. Apps must be recertified every 2 years.
submission.appealsProcess: Work with HubSpot App Partner team

seo.metaTitle: HubSpot App Marketplace - Zero Commission CRM Integrations
seo.metaDescription: Publish your HubSpot apps with 0% commission. Build integrations for HubSpot's CRM platform and keep 100% of your revenue.

pros: Access to HubSpot Affiliate Program (30% recurring)
content:
## Overview

HubSpot App Marketplace is one of the most developer-friendly enterprise marketplaces, taking 0% commission from app sales. Launched in 2017, it connects over 1,500 apps with HubSpot's growing customer base.

## App Partner Program

### Key Benefits
- 0% commission on all app sales
- Free marketplace listing
- Developer support resources
- Access to HubSpot's API and SDKs
- Discounted INBOUND event sponsorship

### Certification Requirements
As of August 2025:
- All certified apps follow a 2-year certification cycle
- Apps must meet UX, security, and functionality standards
- Failure to recertify results in loss of certified status

## Monetization

Developers handle their own billing and payments:
- No HubSpot-managed checkout
- Use your own payment processor
- Keep 100% of revenue

name: Microsoft Store
tagline: The official app store for Windows devices
description: Microsoft Store is the official digital distribution platform for Windows 10 and Windows 11 apps, games, movies, TV shows, and more. It provides access to hundreds of millions of Windows PC users worldwide.

commissionTiers.conditions: For most apps using Microsoft commerce
For games using Microsoft commerce
For non-gaming apps using their own commerce system

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Free registration for individual developers (company accounts pay $99 one-time). 15% for apps, 12% for games using Microsoft commerce. Developers using their own commerce system keep 100% for non-gaming apps.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must meet Microsoft Store policies including privacy, security, and content guidelines. Both UWP and traditional Win32 apps are accepted.
submission.appealsProcess: Submit appeals through Partner Center

seo.metaTitle: Microsoft Store - Windows App Distribution
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Windows apps on Microsoft Store. Low commission rates starting at 12% for games, reach 1 billion Windows users.

pros: 0% commission when using your own commerce
Supports both UWP and Win32 apps
cons: Users often bypass store for direct downloads
content:
## Overview

Microsoft Store is the built-in app store for Windows 10 and 11. In recent years, Microsoft has significantly improved the platform, reducing commission rates and opening it to more app types including traditional Win32 apps and PWAs.

## App Types Supported

### Universal Windows Platform (UWP)
Native Windows apps that can run across Windows 10/11 devices.

### Win32 Apps
Traditional Windows desktop applications packaged in MSIX format.

### Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)
Web apps that can be installed and run like native apps.

### Android Apps (via WSA)
Select Android apps can run on Windows 11 through Windows Subsystem for Android.

name: Salesforce AppExchange
description: Salesforce AppExchange is the world's leading enterprise cloud marketplace, offering thousands of apps, components, and consulting services that extend Salesforce functionality. With millions of installs, it's essential for reaching Salesforce's global customer base.

commissionTiers.conditions: Standard revenue share for ISV partners selling on AppExchange
For OEM-embedded applications

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: ISVforce partners pay 15% revenue share. Security review costs $999 per attempt for paid apps (free for free apps). Credit card transactions have an additional $0.30 Stripe fee.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must pass Salesforce security review ($999 for paid apps). Must comply with Salesforce platform guidelines and best practices.
submission.appealsProcess: Work with Salesforce Partner Success team

seo.metaTitle: Salesforce AppExchange - Enterprise Cloud Marketplace
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Salesforce apps on AppExchange. Reach millions of Salesforce customers with 15% revenue share for ISV partners.

pros: Access to Salesforce's massive enterprise customer base
15% revenue share is competitive for enterprise
cons: $999 security review fee for paid apps
content:
## Overview

Salesforce AppExchange, launched in 2006, is the world's leading enterprise cloud marketplace. It offers over 7,000 apps and has seen millions of installs, making it essential for ISVs targeting Salesforce's customer base of 150,000+ companies.

## Partner Programs

### ISVforce Program
- 15% revenue share on AppExchange sales
- Access to Salesforce platform features
- Partner support and resources

### Security Review
All paid apps must pass security review:
- $999 per attempt
- Automated and manual testing
- Typically takes 4-6 weeks
- Free for free apps

## AppExchange Checkout
Salesforce handles billing and payments:
- Bank transfer: 15% revenue share
- Credit card: 15% + $0.30 per transaction

name: Samsung Galaxy Store
tagline: Samsung's official app store for Galaxy devices
description: Samsung Galaxy Store is the official app marketplace for Samsung Galaxy smartphones, tablets, and wearables. Pre-installed on all Samsung devices, it offers a curated selection of apps optimized for Samsung's ecosystem.

commissionTiers.conditions: 80:20 revenue share for paid apps, themes, and in-app items
85:15 revenue share for subscriptions

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Samsung offers competitive revenue sharing: developers receive 80% for paid apps and in-app items, and 85% for subscriptions. Rates are subject to deductions for sales tax and bank fees.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must be compatible with Samsung devices and meet Samsung's quality standards. Galaxy Store specific features like Samsung Pay integration are encouraged.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Samsung Developer Support for review appeals

seo.metaTitle: Samsung Galaxy Store - Android App Distribution for Samsung Devices
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Android apps on Samsung Galaxy Store. Reach 400M+ Samsung device users with free developer registration.

pros: Free to register as a developer
Direct access to Samsung's massive user base
cons: Longer review times than Google Play
content:
## Overview

Samsung Galaxy Store (formerly Samsung Apps) is Samsung's proprietary app store, available on all Samsung Galaxy smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, and smart TVs running Tizen.

## Benefits for Developers

### Samsung Device Integration
- One UI optimization support
- Samsung Pay integration
- Galaxy Watch app distribution
- Samsung DeX support
- Bixby integration capabilities

### Promotional Opportunities
Samsung actively promotes apps through:
- Galaxy Store featured sections
- Samsung Members app promotions
- Device-specific recommendations

name: Shopify App Store
description: Shopify App Store is the official marketplace for apps that extend Shopify's e-commerce platform. With millions of merchants and over 10,000 apps, it's the leading marketplace for e-commerce tools and integrations.

commissionTiers.conditions: 0% revenue share on first $1M lifetime revenue (not annual)
15% on all revenue after reaching $1M lifetime threshold (with $19 registration)
20% if not enrolled in reduced rate program

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: First $1M lifetime revenue is commission-free. After that, 15% applies (requires $19 one-time fee, otherwise 20%). All billing subject to 2.9% processing fee. Changed in 2025 from annual to lifetime threshold.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must meet Shopify's quality standards including performance, UX, security, and merchant experience requirements.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Shopify Partner Support

seo.metaTitle: Shopify App Store - E-commerce App Marketplace
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Shopify apps with 0% commission on first $1M lifetime revenue. Reach millions of Shopify merchants.

pros: Shopify handles billing via App Billing API
cons: 2025 change: $1M threshold is now lifetime, not annual
content:
## Overview

Shopify App Store is the leading e-commerce app marketplace, serving millions of merchants with over 10,000 apps. In 2025, Shopify changed their revenue share policy from annual to lifetime thresholds.

## 2025 Revenue Share Changes

**Important:** As of 2025, the $1M commission-free threshold is now **lifetime**, not annual:
- First $1M lifetime revenue: 0% commission
- After $1M lifetime: 15% (or 20% without $19 registration)
- All transactions: 2.9% processing fee

### Impact
- Small developers (<$1M total): No change
- Larger developers: Pay commission on full revenue after exceeding lifetime threshold

## App Billing API

Shopify handles billing through their API:
- Recurring charges (subscriptions)
- One-time charges
- Usage-based charges
- Automatic merchant invoicing

name: Slack App Directory
tagline: Apps and integrations for Slack workspaces
description: Slack App Directory is the official marketplace for apps and integrations that extend Slack's collaboration platform. Developers can list free and paid apps to reach millions of Slack users across 750,000+ organizations.

commissionTiers.conditions: Slack does not take a cut of app sales; developers handle their own billing

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Slack App Directory does not charge commission on app sales. Developers are responsible for their own payment processing and billing infrastructure.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Apps must follow Slack's App Directory guidelines including security, user experience, and support requirements. Must respond to support requests within 2 business days.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Slack Developer Relations at feedback@slack.com

seo.metaTitle: Slack App Directory - Build Integrations for Slack
seo.metaDescription: Publish your Slack apps with 0% commission. Reach millions of users across 750,000+ organizations using Slack.

cons: Developers must handle their own billing
Must provide responsive support (2 business day SLA)
content:
## Overview

Slack App Directory launched in 2015 and has grown to over 2,600 apps serving millions of users. Since Salesforce's acquisition of Slack in 2021, the platform has continued to expand its developer ecosystem.

## Developer Requirements

### Support Requirements
- Clear contact method for support
- No additional signup required for support
- Respond within 2 business days
- Maintain up-to-date documentation

### App Guidelines
Effective December 10, 2024:
- Security best practices
- User privacy compliance
- Minimal permission scopes
- Clear value proposition

## Monetization

Developers handle all billing:
- Choose your own payment processor
- Set your own pricing models
- Keep 100% of revenue
- No Slack-managed checkout

name: Steam
tagline: The world's largest PC gaming platform
description: Steam is the dominant digital distribution platform for PC gaming, developed by Valve Corporation. With a massive library of games and a thriving community, it's the go-to platform for PC gamers worldwide.

commissionTiers.conditions: Standard rate for most developers
Reduced rate for higher earners
Lowest rate for top performers

fees.reducedCommissionDetails: Steam offers tiered commission: 30% up to $10M, 25% from $10-50M, and 20% above $50M in lifetime revenue.

submission.guidelinesSummary: Steam has relatively open submission policies. Games must meet basic quality standards and content guidelines. The $100 fee is refundable after earning $1,000.
submission.appealsProcess: Contact Steam Support or Valve directly

seo.metaTitle: Steam - PC Game Distribution Platform
seo.metaDescription: Publish your games on Steam, the world's largest PC gaming platform. Access 132M+ monthly users with comprehensive developer tools.

pros: Largest PC gaming platform and user base
Remote Play and Steam Deck support
cons: Discovery can be challenging for new developers
content:
## Overview

Steam, launched in 2003, dominates the PC gaming market. It offers not just game distribution but a complete ecosystem including community features, streaming, and hardware integration through Steam Deck.

## Steamworks Features

### Community Features
- Steam Workshop for mods
- Community Hub and forums
- Trading Cards and badges
- Steam Broadcasting

### Technical Features
- Cloud saves
- Achievement system
- Multiplayer infrastructure
- Anti-cheat systems
- Remote Play Together
